statements: SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, surgeon_name, procedure_type FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgery_duration > 3.5;
SELECT surgeon_name, COUNT(*) AS num_surgeries FROM robotic_surgeries GROUP BY surgeon_name ORDER BY num_surgeries DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE procedure_type = 'Knee Replacement' OR procedure_type = 'Hip Replacement';
SELECT AVG(surgery_duration) AS avg_duration FROM robotic_surgeries;
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, surgeon_name, procedure_type, surgery_duration, outcomes FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgery_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT surgeon_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM robotic_surgeries GROUP BY surgeon_name;
SELECT procedure_type, AVG(surgery_duration) AS avg_duration FROM robotic_surgeries GROUP BY procedure_type ORDER BY avg_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE outcomes LIKE '%successful%';
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM robots WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM surgeries WHERE surgery_type = 'Brain Surgery';
SELECT surgery_id, surgery_type, surgery_date FROM surgeries ORDER BY surgery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name FROM robots WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT robot_name, surgery_type FROM robots JOIN surgeries ON robots.robot_id = surgeries.robot_id;
SELECT * FROM surgeries WHERE surgery_type = 'Brain Surgery';
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(surgery_id) AS surgery_count FROM surgeries GROUP BY robot_id HAVING COUNT(surgery_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries;
SELECT surgery_id, surgeon_id, surgery_date FROM robotic_surgeries;
SELECT note_id, surgery_id, note_text FROM surgery_notes WHERE surgery_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT surgery_id, survival FROM surgery_outcomes WHERE recovery_time_days > 10;
SELECT outcome_id, surgery_id, survival, recovery_time_days FROM surgery_outcomes ORDER BY recovery_time_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgeon_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT surgery_id, duration_minutes FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE complication = true ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgeries JOIN surgery_notes ON robotic_surgeries.surgery_id = surgery_notes.surgery_id WHERE note_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT surgeon_id, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM robotic_surgeries GROUP BY surgeon_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;

SELECT DISTINCT surgery_id, survival FROM robotic_surgeries JOIN surgery_outcomes ON robotic_surgeries.surgery_id = surgery_outcomes.surgery_id WHERE recovery_time_days > 30 ORDER BY surgery_outcomes.survival DESC, surgery_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM surgeries;
SELECT id, date, procedure_type FROM surgeries WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT surgeon_id, COUNT(*) AS total_surgeries FROM surgeries GROUP BY surgeon_id;
SELECT name AS surgeon_name, specialty FROM surgeons ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM complications WHERE complication_type LIKE '%infection%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, procedure_type, outcome FROM surgeries WHERE procedure_type = 'Appendectomy' AND outcome = 'Success'
SELECT surgeries.id, surgeons.name, surgeries.procedure_type FROM surgeries JOIN surgeons ON surgeries.surgeon_id = surgeons.id WHERE surgeons.specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT surgeries.date, surgeons.name FROM surgeries JOIN surgeons ON surgeries.surgeon_id = surgeons.id ORDER BY surgeries.date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT surgeries.date, complications.complication_type FROM surgeries LEFT JOIN complications ON surgeries.id = complications.surgery_id
SELECT * FROM RobotSurgeries ORDER BY surgery_id ASC;
SELECT surgeon_name, surgery_date, outcome FROM RobotSurgeries WHERE surgery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Medtronic%';
SELECT note_text FROM SurgicalNotes WHERE surgery_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM RobotSurgeries WHERE surgery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT surgeon_name, specialization, experience_years FROM Surgeons WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY specialization;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE warranty_period > 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT surgery_id, surgeon_name, surgery_date, outcome FROM RobotSurgeries JOIN Surgeons ON RobotSurgeries.surgeon_name = Surgeons.surgeon_name ORDER BY surgery_date ASC;
